author: Brandon Sanderson
review: A tale of a heist set against a backdrop of political intrigue and magical martial-arts action in a world where ash falls from the sky.

author: Patrick Rothfuss
review: An intricate and compelling narrative following the life of Kvothe, a gifted young man who grows to be the most notorious wizard his world has ever seen.

author: Robert Jordan
review: The first book in the 'Wheel of Time' series, it sets off an epic tale of destiny, magic, and power, with a richly developed world.

author: George R.R. Martin
review: A political and multi-layered saga set in a world where summers span decades and winters can last a lifetime. The struggle for the Iron Throne has begun.

author: N.K. Jemisin
review: In a world where the earth is fraught with seismic catastrophes, the story intertwines the lives of three women in a fight for survival.

author: Brandon Sanderson
review: A tale of a heist set against a backdrop of political intrigue and magical martial-arts action in a world where ash falls from the sky.
